chapters.title: Chapter 6:  Doorways
chapters.info: Lord Gaebril, p. 137 (115)—New advisor to Queen Morgase of Andor. Mat overheard him giving orders to kill Elayne while in the garden outside Gaebril's room. Elayne believes her mother to be too strong to let herself be influenced by a man, but Gaebril seems to be doing so quite effectively. Gaebril most likely is not who he says he is; he's able to control Morgase, was available at just the right time to restore order in her absence, and plots to kill not only Elayne, but Egwene and Nynaeve as well. Names are easily changed, however. See also Rahvin.
